entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 1.0.0.178. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv and dqc_0011.csv successful. - /var/folders/18/_kbcbv855dxf82x5yvny6h0c0000gn/T/tmpydmzq3gy/packages/resources.zip

[DQC.US.0057.7494] One of the following elements Cash, CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue, CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRestrictedCashEquivalentsIncludingDisposalGroupAndDiscontinuedOperations, CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRestrictedCashEquivalents, CashCashEquivalentsAndFederalFundsSold, CashAndDueFromBanks, CashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue, CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValueIncludingDiscontinuedOperations should appear as the opening and closing balance in the cash flow statement using the group http://www.meditech.com/role/StatementOfCashFlows5. Instead the following balance items have been used in this statement PreconfirmationCashAndCashEquivalents, PostconfirmationCashAndCashEquivalents. Depending if ASU-2016-18 has been adopted at least one of the opening and closing balance items listed must be used in the cash flow statement.
Rule Element Id:7494 Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 -
